hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWI_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, PM_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE, EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWI_CODE, EOWI_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWI_QUANTITY, EOWI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI_NET_WEIGHT, EOWI_VOLUME, EOWI_LOT_NO, EOWI_PRICE, EOWI_AMOUNT, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOWI_REMARK, EOWI_LINK_PM_CODE, EOWI_PRODUCTION_DATE, EOWI_SHELF_LIFE, EOWI_SHELF_LIFE_UNIT, EOWI_LOTATT01, EOWI_LOTATT02, EOWI_LOTATT03, EOWI_LOTATT04, EOWI_LOTATT05, EOWI_LOTATT06, EOWI_LOTATT07, EOWI_LOTATT08, EOWI_LOTATT09, EOWI_LOTATT10, EOWI_LOTATT11, EOWI_LOTATT12, EOWI_ITEM_DENSITY, EOWI_ITEM_STATUS, EOWI_PRODUCT_MODEL, EOWI_CHARGE_STANDARD, EOWI_IS_TEMPERATURE, EOWI_IS_COMBINATION, EOWI_ITEM_SCALE, EOWI_IS_DANGEROUS, EOWI_IN_ITEM_STATUS, EOWI_SALESMAN_CODE, EOWI_SALESMAN_NAME, EOWI_SOURCE_DATA_NO, EOWI_JOB_NO, EOWI_INVOICE_RECOVER_STATUS, EOWI_INVOICE_LINE, EOWI_UNIT_QUANTITY, EOWI_UNIT_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI_UNIT_VOLUME, EOWI_UPSTREAM_LINE_NO, EOWI_COM_INSPECT_REMARKS, EOWI_SOURCE_SUBINV_CODE, EOWI_TARGET_SUBINV_CODE, EOWI_PALLET_ID, EOWI_SCAN_QUANTITY, EOWI_ORDER_NO, EOWI_PRICE_NO_TAX, EOWI_CUSTOMER_ITEM_NO, EOWI_LOC_CODE, EOWI_TRACE_NO, EOWI_LINE_NO, EOWI_MAIN_GOODS_CODE, EOWI_LOT_LINE_NO, EOWI_ADJUSTMEN_TYPE, EOWI_WMS_ID FROM EO_WORK_REAL_ITEM WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE:eowiWorkOrderNo>> <<AND EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO in(:eowiWorkOrderNos)>> <<AND EOWI_CODE LIKE :eowiCode>> <<AND EOWI_LINK_PM_CODE LIKE:eowiLinkPmCode>> <<AND EOWI_LINK_PM_CODE in(:eowiLinkPmCodes)>> <<AND EOWI_JOB_NO LIKE :eowiJobNo>> <<AND EOWI_JOB_NO in(:eowiJobNos)>> <<AND EOWI_UPSTREAM_LINE_NO LIKE :eowiUpstreamLineNo>> <<AND EOWI_UPSTREAM_LINE_NO in(:eowiUpstreamLineNos)>>
